common.title: Daytl.
common.info: Simple and useful online tools in one place.
common.info2:
Missing your favorite online tool? Let us know or help us create it.
Daytl.com is an open source built on Gatsby.js
common.description: Simple and useful online tools in one place.

remover.title: Html and breaks Remover
remover.info: Remover breaklines, html tags and even more.
remover.keywords: online breaks remover, online html remover
remover.description: Remover breaklines, html tags and even more.

base64-encode-decode.title: Base64 Encode and Decode
base64-encode-decode.info: Encode and decode text or images to base64 format.
base64-encode-decode.description: Encode and decode text or images to base64 format.

passwordGenerator.title: Password generator
passwordGenerator.info: Secure password generator with the ability to generate multiple passwords at once and download as a file.
passwordGenerator.content:
A random password is generated directly in your browser and is not sent anywhere. Using a random password that is strong enough will increase the security of your online access.

A secure password should be long enough and consist of upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters. Ideální je také použít pro každou online službu jiné heslo.

To manage the passwords you generate, it's a good idea to use a so-called password manager, such as KeePass, which stores passwords in an encrypted file on your computer. You then just need to remember one master password to unlock that file.
passwordGenerator.description: Secure password generator with the ability to generate multiple passwords at once and download as a file.
